text: aur isee prakaar, hamane unhen jaga diya, taaki ve aapas mein prashn karen. to ek ne unamen se kahaah tum kitane (samay) rahe ho? sabane kahaah ham ek din rahe hain athava ek din ke kuchh (samay). (phir) sabane kahaah allaah adhik jaanata hai ki tum kitane (samay) rahe ho, tum apane mein se kisee ko, apana ye sikka dekar nagar mein bhejo, phir dekhe ki kisake paas adhik svachchh (pavitr) bhojan hai aur usamen se kuchh jeevika (bhojan) laaye aur chaahie ki saavadhaanee barate. aisa na ho ki tumhaara kisee ko anubhav ho jaaye
